title: The Navigator's Guide to DigitalOcean
description: This book walks businesses down a path of planning out all of their infrastructure needs on DigitalOcean and provides working code examples along the way. It includes technical nuance and explaining why some decisions are better than others.
author: Fabian Barajas, Jonathan Schwenn
